name: Divi Socials
author: David Towoju

sections.description:
Divi is a beautiful theme but you can only add few icons to your header. This plugin allows you to add your favourite social icons without writing a single line of code.

Features

  • Add Linkedin, Pinterest, Tumblr, Skype, Flickr, Myspace, Instagram, Dribble, Vimeo etc
  • Colorize your icons to make them look cool
  • Change the look of your icons – outline, square, circle

For backwards compatibility, if this section is missing, the full length of the short description will be used, and
Markdown parsed.

Feedback

  • I am open for your suggestions and feedback – Thank you for using or trying out my first plugin!
  • Send me a message on my website
sections.installation:
Please make sure you have the ** Divi Theme ** installed and follow these steps

e.g.

  1. Upload divi-socials.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Look under Settings for “Divi Socials” to add your links and customization
  4. Links should start like so “www.facebook.com/…”
  5. If you have not already, go to Theme Options or Theme Customizer and under Header Elements, check “Show Social Icons”
sections.faq:
Does this plugin work only with the Divi Theme

Yes

short_description: Divi Socials adds more social icons with different styles and colors to your Divi header.
